description: One 20 oz bottle of Simply Heinz Tomato Ketchup. Simply Heinz Tomato Ketchup is the thick & rich ketchup your family loves. Simple ketchup made with the highest quality ingredients. Made with no high fructose corn syrup. Ketchup is gluten free. Easy to squeeze ketchup bottle makes serving clean and easy. Resealable bottle to lock in flavor in the fridge. SNAP & EBT eligible food item.

latest_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
latest_reviews.text: Why was I nervous to order this off Amazon? Came in perfect condition, great price, sealed up and is exactly what I would buy at the store. The Simply is our fav because the ingredients are much cleaner than other types. Tastes great and we definitely need the larger perfect size for my ketchup fans! Love that itâ€™s lower in sugar and not too salty. Great size!
